<title level="1" right="Focus 1" pfs="Standard">
[Shielding Strike](/Spells.aspx?ID=1041)
<actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Magus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=389" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 143 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

As you attack a foe, warding magic transforms your momentum into action and lifts your shield. Make a melee Strike. You can then either [Raise your Shield](/Actions.aspx?ID=98) if you're wielding one or cast [_shield_](/Spells.aspx?ID=280) if you have the spell.
name: Shielding Strike
